title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 653.6 - Interest on refunds of the mortgage recording taxes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 653.6 - Interest on refunds of the mortgage recording taxes

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 263

In cases where interest is to be paid on a refund, as
provided in section
654.5
of this

Title, the rate of interest shall be as follows: (1)

Where the refund of the mortgage
recording taxes paid relates to mortgages of real property located in counties
outside the City of New York, the rate of interest is one-half of one per
centum for each month or fraction of a month for the period described in
section
654.5
(b) this Title. (2)
(i) Where the refund or the mortgage
recording taxes paid relates to mortgages of real property located in counties
within the City of New York, the rate of interest is the overpayment rate set
pursuant to section 1096(e) of article 27 of the Tax Law for the period
described in section
654.5
(b) of this Title. (ii)

Where the
commissioner fails to set the rate of interest as described in subparagraph (I)
of this paragraph, such rate of interest shall be at the rate of six percent
per annum for the period described in section
654.5
(b) of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
653.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
